methods.consistentDateNy:
The same thing as currentDateNy(), but with a different name so you can import it more easily and be
 sure you are getting the right value.

:return: java.lang.String
methods.currentDateNy:
Get the consistent value of currentDateNy() as defined by DBTimeUtils.currentDateNy().

:return: (java.lang.String) the current date in the New York time zone.

text: A consistency monitor for use in the CompositeTableDataService.
